title: 55+ COMMUNITY - Single-level cottage w/ attached garage ^
posting_body: ['JOIN OUR RESERVATION LIST', 'FOR RENT', '$2260', 'per month -', '2 Bed / 2 Bath', '3602 N Narrows Dr, Tacoma, WA, 98407', 'Contact:', 'StoneRidge at the Park', 'show contact info', 'Luxury single-level apartment homes with attached garages, in a beautiful 55+ gated community!', 'StoneRidge at the Park offers craftsman-style apartment homes in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Tacoma!', 'Residents will enjoy the serenity of mountain, park, and city views; and the close proximity to shops, restaurants, Point Defiance Park, and the charming Proctor area!', 'Nestled among eight acres of beautifully landscaped grounds and across the street from a city park, StoneRidge offers the perfect setting to relax and enjoy life.', ' Take comfort in your charming single-story cottage, complete with lovely front porches, vaulted ceilings, private patio and garden area, gas fireplace, attached 1-car garage, and plenty of storage!', 'Cottages come with all appliances, including a full-size washer and dryer.', "Don't bother packing the lawnmower; at StoneRidge, we take care of the yard and property maintenance, so that you can enjoy the things you love.", 'Lease:', 'Annual', 'Rent:', '$2260 per month', 'Property type:', 'Apartment', 'Parking spaces:', '2', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Size:', '1155 sqft', 'Pets allowed:', 'Small dogs, Cats', 'Pet restrictions:', 'We welcome four-legged friends with a $500 pet fee for one pet and an additional $250 for a second pet.', 'The pet fee allows up to two small.', 'Each must weigh less than 35 lbs.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Heating: Gas', 'Washer', 'Dishwasher', 'Dryer', 'Refrigerator', 'Garbage disposal', 'Microwave', 'Double pane windows', 'Vaulted ceiling', 'Deck', 'Cable', 'Patio', 'Porch', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'Architecture: Craftsman', 'Parking: Attached', 'Garden', 'Gated entry', 'Sprinkler system', 'Disabled access', 'Equal Housing Opportunity WWW.NORPOINT.COM']
